snippet: The United States has informed the U.N. Security Council that a top suspect in the deadly 2012 assault in Libya was captured because U.S. investigators determined that he planned further attacks against Americans....

headline.print_headline: US Says Captured Libyan Planned New Attacks
headline.main: US Says Captured Libyan Planned New Attacks

lead_paragraph: The United States has informed the U.N. Security Council that a top suspect in the deadly 2012 assault in Libya was captured because U.S. investigators determined that he planned further attacks against Americans.
